effect.name: Accurate Sonic Fade
effect.description:
Accutate Sonic the Hedgehog fade from Megadrive games! Special thanks to Vectorsatyr for code reference!

parameter.name: Transition
parameter.description: This value changes the fade. If the value is lower object is darker
